name: Sleeping with Charlie Kaufman
description: The rare example of adultery bringing two people closer together, a man admits to an affair and his girlfriend couldn't be happier.

review.author: Bo_Dennis
review.heading: Funny concept, I watched it with the wife and laughed
review.reviewBody:
Short, sweet, and funny. At least I think it's supposed to be funny. Interesting concept to pretend your girlfriend/wife is her twin sister for variety. My wife liked it. 

As a short filmmaker myself, I think this was a sweet film. It had an idea. I don't think many people understand the La Nouvelle Vague stuff, like over-saturation and deep focus but I got it. Clever.

The animation maybe didn't work for me. I think it might have been better as a live-action film. I thought the animation was a little flat.

But nice homage to Charlie Kaufman.
